description: The Sewing Machine Scheme under the Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB) provides financial assistance to registered women construction workers for purchasing sewing machines, enabling self-employment through tailoring.
key_features: Financial aid for sewing machine purchase

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 3,500 for purchasing a sewing machine

occupation_criteria: Must be a registered construction worker with HBOCWWB
residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Haryana

steps: Obtain the application form from the HBOCWWB office
Submit the application with proof of registration
Attach required documents, including Aadhaar and HBOCWWB ID
Applications are reviewed by the board
application_process.note: Applicants must provide proof of sewing machine purchase

special_notes: Assistance is limited to one sewing machine per beneficiary
Applicants must be active HBOCWWB members
Priority is given to economically disadvantaged workers
